ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: For the following questions, indicate how strongly you agree with the statement using a scale from 0 to 100: I have a desire for marijuana right now.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 100= The strongest feeling possible

ElementDescription: For the following questions, indicate how strongly you agree with the statement using a scale from 0 to 100: I have an urge to use marijuana right now.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 100= The strongest feeling possible

ElementDescription: For the following questions, indicate how strongly you agree with the statement using a scale from 0 to 100: All I want right now is to smoke marijuana.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 100= The strongest feeling possible

ElementDescription: For the following questions, indicate how strongly you agree with the statement using a scale from 0 to 100: I crave marijuana right now.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 100= The strongest feeling possible

ElementDescription: For the following questions, indicate how strongly you agree with the statement using a scale from 0 to 100: I feel high (as in ''drug high'') right now.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 100= The strongest feeling possible

ElementDescription: For the following questions, indicate how strongly you agree with the statement using a scale from 0 to 100: I feel in pain right now.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 100= The strongest feeling possible

ElementDescription: For the following questions, indicate how strongly you agree with the statement using a scale from 0 to 100: I feel anxious right now.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 100= The strongest feeling possible

ElementDescription: For the following questions, indicate how strongly you agree with the statement using a scale from 0 to 100: I feel worried right now.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 100= The strongest feeling possible

ElementDescription: For the following questions, indicate how strongly you agree with the statement using a scale from 0 to 100: I feel sleepy right now.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 100= The strongest feeling possible

ElementDescription: For the following questions, indicate how strongly you agree with the statement using a scale from 0 to 100: My muscles feel relaxed right now.
Notes: 0= Not at all; 100= The strongest feeling possible
